root.dslOnProduce: - filter: - $expectsDate: text - - twitterDateToLong: createdAt - extractDates: text - mongo_insert: liked_tweets
root.dslOnConsume: - filter: - $: sendFlag - - convertForWebhook: - $dateFormat: - $top: $: extractDates - YYYY/MM/DD - $: text - $: linkToTweet - log: gmail_to_calendar_end_data - sendToWebhook: google_calendar
